value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral's WEIRD Proxy Hatchery Rush! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and ShoWTimE (Protoss). In this series Serral decides to cheese in practically every game, even though he's usually a macro Zerg. These games were played in the lower bracket of the HomeStory Cup 22 playoffs. value.title: StarCraft 2: The ZERG's Command Center! (Viewer Game)
